mapper.select: select member_no, l.book_no, b.img, b.name, b.author, b.comp, b.price from book b, like_it l where member_no=${memberNo} and b.book_no=l.book_no
select * from like_it where member_no = #{memberNo} and book_no = #{bookNo}
mapper.delete: delete from like_it where book_no = #{bookNo} and member_no = #{memberNo}
